title: Gabriel's Chalice
description: It is the year 2028. Plagues, pestilence and vast global disasters suddenly erupt. As spewing volcanoes cover the Earth with a dense cloud of ash, God sends the Archangel Gabriel with an incredible message for mankind...Dr. Raphael Matteo, a leading geologist with NASA, anxiously studies the signs and disasters foretold in of the New Testament. Accompany him as he encounters the Archangel Gabriel during a walk outside of Moon Base Challenger. Follow the CDC as plagues threaten life on earth as we know it, while signs in the sky make their way over Jerusalem...a city that will shine like a sparkling diamond.
author: Frank A. Ruffolo
